definition: a person of great moral stature does not remember the offenses committed by one of low moral stature
pinyin: da4 ren2 bu4 ji4 xiao3 ren2 guo4

definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
